GuardPhase2HALF: ^Tell me about it, ever since the mayor got back from an expedition, the town's been in a little frenzy, people taking their own little issues into blown out brawls is starting to wear me out.
^You think the mayor's got something to do with this frenzy?
^Curious, so the mayor must have brought something to town.
GuardPhase2: ^Unusual is putting it lightly, even I've been feeling a little angry lately, but life's been alright so far, but I can't seem to take control of my anger recently, after the mayor's return
^So conflict's been a problem in this town as of recently..
GuardPhase3: ^And it's getting worse. If anyone could figure out why this is happening, they'd be doing us a favor.
